title: Ep 36: Kate Baer
itunes:title: Ep 36: Kate Baer
itunes:subtitle: Poet Kate Baer joins us to talk all about the Amazon overalls she wears all year round, her new book of poems (“What Kind Of Woman” is out in November 2020!), and how we feel about our bodies. We love to talk about our bodies here! Also, Kate reveals t...
description:
Poet Kate Baer joins us to talk all about the Amazon overalls she wears all year round, her new book of poems (“What Kind Of Woman” is out in November 2020!), and how we feel about our bodies. We love to talk about our bodies here! Also, Kate reveals the craziest thing she saw one time in a TJ Maxx dressing room.


(Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there!)


Pre-order Kate’s book! It comes out 11/10/2020 and I am so excited to devour it. Devour it with me: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780063008427 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • The overalls Kate loves (size up!): https://amzn.to/33c4M5G 
  • The overalls I love (size up!): https://amzn.to/39JSUsM 
  • The Amazon Bathing Suit (size up!) https://amzn.to/39IlJWT 
  • My favorite headband: https://amzn.to/3jYeleH 
  • Birkenstocks: https://fave.co/338Oz1e
  • Similar overalls with more sizes!: https://amzn.to/339F5CL


Follow Kate on Instagram: www.instagram.com/katejbaer 


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 





Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
